channel.title: Documenting the journey on Twitter
channel.description:
I've decided to document my new bootstrapped path on Twitter. Full transparency and honesty on my failures and successes comes with no extra charge. It is my belief that by sharing things publicly I'll be naturally inclined to step up my game and meet like-minded people. I'd also love to know if anyone has solid Twitter handles to follow for a passionate bootstrapper as well.
[https://twitter.com/therockymadden][1]
[1]: https://twitter.com/therockymadden

item.title: Documenting the journey on Twitter
item.dc:creator: itengelhardt
item.description:
Way to go, Rocky!

Twitter sounds like a challenging medium to do that. I’m looking forward to reading your success stories

Read full topic

item.title: Documenting the journey on Twitter
item.dc:creator: jjude
item.description:
I too document my entrepreneurial journey, but in a blog. I find 140 characters too limiting. I also wrote why documenting your decisions a useful one.

Read full topic
